offer.title: Terms and Conditions
offer.content:
By purchasing products offered by Muhabbat Pastellari, you agree to the following terms:

1. Products are made from high-quality materials.
2. All products are sold legally.
3. Prices apply as shown on the website.
4. Returns and exchanges are possible within 7 days of product delivery.
5. Order cancellation can be done before delivery.
6. Payment is made in cash or by bank transfer.
7. Delivery is carried out within 3-5 business days.

For more information, please contact us.

about.title: About Us
about.storyContent: Muhabbat Pastellari was founded in 2021 and has since been producing and selling high-quality pastel and textile products. Our main goal is to provide our customers with the best quality and service.
about.missionContent: We strive to provide each of our customers with high-quality, long-lasting, and beautiful products. Our products are larger than standard market sizes and have excellent color retention.
about.qualityContent: All our products undergo strict quality control. We use 100% HB materials and our products don't shrink or fade.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What materials are the products made from?
faq.a1: All our products are made from 100% high-quality HB material that lasts long and doesn't fade.
faq.a2: Typically, delivery is completed within 3-5 business days. Local deliveries may be faster.
faq.a3: Yes, returns or exchanges are possible within 7 days of product delivery. The product must be undamaged and in its original condition.
faq.a4: We accept cash and bank transfer payments. Payment can be made upon delivery or when placing an order.
faq.a5: Our products are larger than standard market sizes. Exact dimensions are shown on each product page.
faq.a6: Yes, we offer special prices for wholesale orders. Contact us for more details.
